评论概述: Fantastic watch Horrible link adjustment tool
评论详情: The watch is flawless and I love it. The pictures don’t do it justice it looks even better in person. The main concern of this review is the link adjustment tool. The needle used to poke out the pins is simply too high to accurately push out/in the pin and is impossible to use without bending the needle. I recommend saving your time, throwing it away and going to a jewelry store and have them adjust the length of the watch to your preference.
